article_title: What 'The View' And Joy Behar Don't Know About Nurses' Expanding Role

article_metadata.description: The View and co-host Joy Behar are backpedaling from Behar’s questioning why Miss America contestant and nurse Kelley Johnson was wearing a “doctor’s stethoscope” during a monologue. The comments, since described by Behar as “stupid and inattentive” on her part, come during what is perhaps an unprecedented period for the expanding [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
